title: MY Portfolio
description: A sleek and responsive personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experience as a Front-End Developer. Built using modern technologies to deliver smooth animations, interactive UI, and an optimized user experience.

title: Clothing App
description: E-commerce platform built with React, React Router, Bootstrap & Context API.

title: Doctor App
description: A responsive and accessible doctor booking interface built using React, Zustand, and TailwindCSS. This project was created as a frontend task and demonstrates clean UI design, reusable components, filtering logic, and smooth animations.

title: Vegist App
description: Food ordering platform using HTML, CSS, JS & Bootstrap.

title: FitMeal App
description: Fitness-focused meal planner using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

title: Mulk App
description: Real estate listing website with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

title: Burger App
description: Responsive burger shop website using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

title: KinderGarten App
description: Kindergarten info platform with colorful and kid-friendly UI.

title: Nooni App
description: Product showcase site optimized for performance and compatibility.

title: NextJs_Typescript_Project
description: Modern Hero Section UI for a Next.js & TypeScript project, featuring a clean layout, responsive design, and developer-focused style. Perfect for landing pages, SaaS tools, or personal portfolios using Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion.

title: Js Projects
description: A collection of mini JavaScript projects focused on DOM manipulation, events, and UI logic — built with vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS.
